Html: I have a datagrid with its own data source (via Datacontext) and one of the columns on this grid is a combo box column. I am unable to find an example of code where the combobox has its own set of data. The datacontext method does not exist in this column and I think I'm stuck. Can someone please point me to an example like the one here?

Vincent's blog has a pretty good run down on how to use DataGridComboBoxColumn.  http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/10/31/wpf-datagrid-datagridcomboboxcolumn-v1-intro.aspx

While that is specifically about the V1 datagrid there shouldn't be any big changes needed.

 

Thanks
